metadata.name: COCOON OF DOUBT
metadata.description:
Throughout our lives, we grow into a kind of cocoon from the doubts of others.

After all, how easy it is to impose your own fears on others and thus control people

I consider it necessary to convey this message to the maximum number of people around the world:

â€œDon't you dare let others create this cocoon of doubt around you, be it a family member, friend, work colleague, media person

NO ONE has the right to control your life experience, your actions and decisions

Free yourself from the cocoon of doubt around you!
